attributes.action: For Government to make it law for the media to produce unbiased  news reports
attributes.additional_details: We know from threats made by ISIS back in February that they intended to swamp Europe with their fighters to continue their Jihad here. The migrant riots in a number of EU states may well be the surfacing frustration of their anticipation of what is to come. this coupled with the weapons finds in Egypt and Greece, and the discovery of an ISIS fighter in Stuttgart, and boxes of fake Syrian Passports, gives reasonable grounds to conclude that ISIS did not make an idle threat.
attributes.background: current media reports on the migrant crisis have a distinct biased towards the plight of the migrants/refugees whilst ignoring the disturbances such as migrant rioting in Greece, Spain Italy and Sweden and the weapons and ammunition interceptions by Egypt and Greece. their reports must be balanced.
